values:
Well lets see...everything went to hell today...in more ways than one..so I'm happily going toget really really drunk!
I don't want to hope for anything good anymore as they'll only get dashed.
I feel so lonely and awful...will I ever be happy?

Huzzah! it is now officially holidays for me.
I'm so happy...no more teaching for two whole weeks!!
Also I get to go manga shopping in the second week...YAY!

man I hate being sick.  I have a cold, I mean i know its winter and all but still...
At least I don't have to teach until this after noon and its only for an hour.
On the great side of things tho I got to see my love.  It was great!

All I'm trying to do now is get memebrs for my forum...that's the tricky bit..lol

the site is.

http://s9.invisionfree.com/Forbidden_Forests/

if you wish to take a look.
